comments.body: This may seem like an unnecessary request, and feel free to ignore me, but maybe could you add `assert.strictEqual(process.cwd(), '')` below this line, to make sure that overriding actually worked? I could see a Node.js collaborator coming along and making `process.cwd()` non-writable, in which case this assignment would fail silentlyâ€¦
Done, thanks, I didn't think about it
I'm going to squash this into the original commit ;-)
